response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This unique offering holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Considering its exceptional quality and the effort put into it, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $8,500. I believe this is a fair and generous offer that respects both the product's worth and your budget. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 8500}
